description: The QRY_RECORD_INFO table contains information about the no-add single response data for query records (records in the QRY master file).

columns.name: QUERY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the query record.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The ID received from a third party to uniquely identify the record in their system.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The overall status of the query.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Response Received


Completed


Deleted


Deactivated

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID the query refers to.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The patient contact (CSN) the query refers to.

columns.name: CREATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the query was created in UTC.

columns.name: UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the query record was updated in UTC.

columns.name: QUERY_WORKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The workflow this query is a part of (Computer Assisted Physician Documentation (CAPD), Clinical Documentation Improvement, etc.). This value is used to drive functionality and reporting.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Coding Query


CDI Query


Coding Documentation Deficiency


CAPD

columns.name: QRY_HIDE_PHYS_YN
columns.description:
If this is set to 1-Yes, it will prevent physicians from seeing the query in the NoteReader Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) activity. If NoteReader CDI is in silent mode, all incoming queries will have this flag set automatically. CDI users can reset this flag by activating the query manually.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the record was last locked/unlocked.
